content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I must say that the rental price is negotiable. What is your budget for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 700 Euros per month. I am willing to negotiate, but I want to be clear that I am looking for the lowest price possible. If there is something that I can do to help lower the price, please let me know.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Understood, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, please keep in mind that the apartment is only 25 square meters, which may limit its value in the rental market. With that in mind, my initial offer for the monthly rental price is 800 Euros. Is this within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, it is within my budget. However, I am hoping to negotiate for a lower price. I would be willing to pay 650 Euros per month if that is possible.

Is there anything I can do to help lower the price?

Thank you for your time.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Emilia. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. I will take your offer of 650 Euros per month into consideration. However, I must inform you that the apartment is located in a busy area of Mannheim, which may increase the rental value. Additionally, I am a landlord who wants to maximize my gains, so I am not willing to lower the price any further. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine
